constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 20 (Wednesday, February 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. YOUNG:
H.R. 783.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2
[Page H325]

latestAction.text: ASSUMING FIRST SPONSORHIP - Mr. Larsen (WA) asked unanimous consent that he may hereafter be considered as the first sponsor of H.R. 783, a bill originally introduced by Representative Young, for the purpose of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII. Agreed to without objection.

title: Summer Meals Act of 2021
